mapper.select: select job.id, job.employee_id, emp.name, job.factory_id, fac.factory_name, job.number, job.style_number, job.category_id, jc.category, job.quantity, job.mode_id, jm.mode, job.salary, job.created_time from job left join employee emp on job.employee_id = emp.id left join factory fac on job.factory_id = fac.id left join job_category jc on job.category_id = jc.id left join job_mode jm on job.mode_id = jm.id where job.created_time = CURDATE() and job.flag = #{flag}

select job.id, job.employee_id, emp.name, job.factory_id, fac.factory_name, job.number, job.style_number, job.category_id, jc.category, job.quantity, job.mode_id, jm.mode, job.salary, job.created_time from job left join employee emp on job.employee_id = emp.id left join factory fac on job.factory_id = fac.id left join job_category jc on job.category_id = jc.id left join job_mode jm on job.mode_id = jm.id
where job.employee_id = #{employeeId} and job.flag = #{flag}
and job.created_time = DATE(#{startDate})
and job.created_time between CURDATE() and #{endDate}
and job.created_time >= DATE(#{startDate}) and job.created_time <= DATE(#{endDate})
and job.created_time = CURDATE()
order by emp.name desc

select job.employee_id, emp.name, sum(job.quantity) as quantity, sum(job.salary) as salary from job left join employee emp on job.employee_id = emp.id where employee_id = #{employeeId} and job.flag = #{flag} and emp.flag = #{flag}
and job.created_time >= DATE(#{startDate}) and job.created_time <= DATE(#{endDate})
and job.created_time between DATE(#{startDate}) and CURDATE()
and job.created_time between CURDATE() and DATE(#{endDate})
and job.created_time between DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') and CURDATE()
group by job.employee_id, emp.name
